description: Basketball reference website developed as an independent project that displays statistics for any player to ever play in the NBA and showcases a new metric created by myself. The site was developed using the MERN stack.
React application that allows the user to draft their own team and compete against nine opponents.
Pokedex application developed using both JQuery and Bootstrap framework. Users can sift through Pokemon data loaded from an external API and dispay key details.

A movie reference style application where movies, and their details, can be searched for. Users are able to register an account, log in, and create a list of favourites and amend personal information. This application was developed with the MERN stack.
An events application built using the API from Meetup.com. The development process involved integration testing and end-to-end testing using Enzyme and Puppeteer respectively.
A todo-list application developed with the Vue.js framework. Users can add, delete, and edit a list of todos.

This simple application was developed using the Angular framework and written with Typsecript. The application presents a preset list of quizzes to undertake and displays the users results upon completion.
